intro.heading: My Professional Journey
intro.subtitle: From web entrepreneurship to maritime solutions, here’s an overview of my key experiences.

barong-cbd-web.title: Creation & Management – Barong CBD Shop
barong-cbd-web.summary: WordPress e-commerce site for Barong CBD Shop
barong-cbd-web.description: Design, development, maintenance and SEO optimization of the Barong CBD Shop e-commerce site.
barong-cbd-web.longDescription: Replaced a Shopify store deemed too limited with a fully custom WordPress site, built from scratch using Divi as a page-builder. Over 100 product references, complete theme rewrite, then full redesign after one year, and integration of a temporary “scratch cards” module for Christmas. Site maintained for two years before hand-off to another provider.
barong-cbd-web.difficulties: Ensuring a smooth transition from Shopify to WordPress without SEO loss, maintaining responsive rendering across all devices, and guaranteeing optimal load times during traffic peaks.

steps.title: Theme development from scratch under Divi
Added a “scratch card” module for Christmas

barong-cbd-comm.title: Visual Communication – Barong CBD Shop
barong-cbd-comm.description: Creation of packaging, store signage, flyers and other print materials for Barong CBD Shop.
barong-cbd-comm.longDescription:
Full management of visual and social communication:
• Created all print materials (flyers, catalogs for professionals)
• Designed signage for the first three points of sale
• Community management on Instagram & Facebook to animate the brand
barong-cbd-comm.difficulties: Delivering a large volume of coherent visuals under tight deadlines while respecting the brand’s identity and marketing requirements.

steps.title: Design of print materials (flyers, packaging, professional catalogs)
Signage design for three store locations
Creation and publication of social media visuals

douma-automobiles.title: Showcase Site – Douma Automobiles
douma-automobiles.summary: Non-transactional e-commerce showcase for high-end vehicles
douma-automobiles.description: Custom showcase site for Douma Automobiles with advanced filters and catalog management.
douma-automobiles.longDescription: Implemented an online catalog via WooCommerce without a payment module, showcasing luxury cars with filters by brand, model, year, mileage… Custom JavaScript modules for dynamic listing management.
douma-automobiles.difficulties: Adapting an existing theme for a catalog-only use, developing custom JS filters while ensuring smooth navigation.

steps.title: Selecting and adapting a WooCommerce theme
Developing custom JS modules for filters

international-events.title: Showcase Site – International Events
international-events.description: WordPress showcase site for a luxury event agency, interrupted by the COVID-19 lockdown.
international-events.longDescription: Custom WordPress theme built from scratch with full-screen video and photo displays, aesthetics akin to a luxury yachting agency. Graphic prototypes validated before project halt due to COVID-19.
international-events.difficulties: Managing a highly visual site while ensuring performance and mobile adaptability; project stopped by the lockdown.

envergure-events.title: Showcase Site – Envergure Events
envergure-events.summary: Wedding showcase for a sole proprietor
envergure-events.description: WordPress site development and client training for autonomous maintenance.
envergure-events.longDescription: Site built with Elementor and client training delivered, followed by an attempted recovery after a hack (outdated Elementor vulnerability). Main lesson: keep your site up to date to avoid security issues.
envergure-events.difficulties: Critical security incident due to an unpatched update; managed the workaround and educated the client on best practices.

services-particuliers.title: Digital Services & Troubleshooting – Private Clients
services-particuliers.summary: Com’ materials, home automation & custom tools
services-particuliers.description: Various services: computer repair, communication materials, domotics installations, utility scripts.
services-particuliers.longDescription:
A catch-all project for private clients:
• PC repair & HomeAssistant maintenance
• Flyers and visuals for Leboncoin/Vinted
• Chrome extensions development (games, remote SoundCloud)
services-particuliers.difficulties: Defining a very heterogeneous scope and delivering fast, reliable solutions for each specific request.

steps.title: Development of Chrome extensions & utility scripts

chess-translation.title: Maritime Software Translation
chess-translation.summary: Localization of a FileMaker Pro 20 app in French & English
chess-translation.longDescription: On FileMaker Pro 20, I translated over a hundred UI components (interfaces, scripts, value-lists) between French and English. Since FM doesn’t natively support localization, I designed a “magic value list” system to manage strings dynamically while keeping the module maintainable and extensible.
chess-translation.difficulties: Working around FileMaker Pro’s limitations for value-list and dynamic text management while ensuring maintainability and extensibility.

steps.title: Studied native translation options & tested multiple approaches
Built initial magic value list prototype
Extended prototype to cover internal value-lists
Validated system with the project team
Deployed and generalized across all production databases

chess-standards.title: Maritime Software Compliance
chess-standards.summary: Bureau Veritas compliance upgrade for a FileMaker CMS
chess-standards.longDescription: For Bureau Veritas Maritime, I led the audit and adaptation of a FileMaker Pro 20 CMS to resolve over fifty non-compliance points. Delivered a demo version, applied targeted fixes, and re-validated the software.
chess-standards.difficulties: Meeting strict standards and ensuring traceability of changes without disrupting existing functionality.

steps.title: Prepared a demo version for initial review
Audited by Bureau Veritas and collected 50+ correction points
Implemented fixes in the FileMaker CMS
Final review and validation by Bureau Veritas
Delivered the user manual (written by colleague)

chess-web-refonte.title: WordPress Rebuild
chess-web-refonte.summary: Dual maritime & yachting showcase under a custom WordPress theme
chess-web-refonte.description: Created a WordPress theme with a “switch” to toggle between shipping and yachting modes.
chess-web-refonte.longDescription: Built a fully from-scratch WordPress theme allowing users to switch between “shipping” and “yachting” modes via a toggle. Workflow: Figma wireframes → local integration → migration to live hosting.
chess-web-refonte.difficulties: Managing dynamic, bilingual content based on mode while maintaining mobile compatibility and performance.

chess-maquette.title: Maritime Software Prototype
chess-maquette.summary: Figma prototype (~150 screens) for internal validation
chess-maquette.longDescription: Created ~150 screens in Figma to model workflows for the new maritime management software. Used internally for rapid testing and iterations.
chess-maquette.difficulties: No negative feedback; smooth iterations with the project team.

steps.title: Design System and style guide creation

chess-doc-gen.title: Regulatory Document Generator
chess-doc-gen.summary: XML/CSV assembly for third-party export, in FileMaker + JS
chess-doc-gen.longDescription: Built a maritime document generator (SMS/PMS) based on text templates with tags, exporting XML/CSV directly consumable by FileMaker Pro or other client software.
chess-doc-gen.difficulties: Implementing complex maritime regulation rules and optimizing for large data volumes.

steps.title: Template modeling with tags & hierarchical structure
Scripted assembly of text segments according to input data
Synchronized XML/CSV exports with client SMS/PMS

chess-cms-maritime.title: Maritime CMS Overhaul
chess-cms-maritime.summary: UI/UX and architecture redesign of a FileMaker CMS, full business modules
chess-cms-maritime.longDescription: Participated in the early phases of a complete CMS overhaul (maintenance, crew, finances, regulatory documents, expenses). Goal: improve ergonomics and reduce technical debt.
chess-cms-maritime.difficulties: Designing a modular architecture within FileMaker constraints while planning data migration.
